name: Once Upon a Night
description:
! KEEP A SMALL POWER PLANT ALIVE !

Made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours. 

It is a basically puzzle game. Do the right actions in the correct order to save the station.

Press needed buttons via left mouse click. Carefully look around and do not forget about sounds. Control panel will say what you have to tune up.

Good luck! Keep it alive, please!
